title: uDress Mobile App
description: uDress is a boutique at your fingertips. This unique platform allows users to post and sell any type of dress. Its easy to use search feature allows buyers to quickly find the type of dress, colorsize that they are looking for!
features: Registration to sell the course with multiple episodes by the Instructor
YouTube videos can be uploaded as course episodes
Allowed users can create free/paid challenges on any course as well as participate.
Users can follow other and start a chat
Notifications regarding friends, requests and challenges

title: Tibbi Mobile App
description: It's a true one-stop healthcare solution which makes healthcare more accessible and affordable for Pakistanis. You can avail discounts on pharmacy and lab services, experience unparalleled services by making a call or click away from all your healthcare needs.
features: Video call sessions between patient and a doctor for recommendations
Medicines as well as Lab tests can be ordered from home
Videos on multiple informative topics
Notifications based on new videos, current and pending orders

title: Career Kitchen Web App
description: Careers Kitchen provides the advice, guidance, tools and resources one need to embark on a career path that perfectly matches his aspirations and future goals. / Careers Kitchens career development program is designed to guide you through your unique career challenges. Whether you're pursuing your first job, a career change, or a promotion. It has a user-friendly platform that provides action-orientated career advice, psychometric insights, and data-driven tools that help identify the perfect career path for you.
features: Use market insights to match you to the market
Help you develop a structured, efficient approach to career planning & job hunting
Ongoing support and guidance User-friendly and convenient digital platform
User-friendly and convenient digital platform
